1. AI will ‘destroy employment in some areas,’ top US economist says. But it’s not all bad news  CNN
  2. This investor predicted the dot-com bust. He thinks AI is a bubble that will ‘deflate’  CNN
  3. The Goldman economist who predicted the financial crash and soft landing says AI will be good for the U.S. economy but will 'destroy employment in some areas'  Fortune
  4. AI will ‘destroy employment in some areas’ and boost others: Goldman economist  MarketWatch
  5. AI will ‘destroy employment in some areas’ but could bring long-term benefits: Goldman Sachs economist  The Hill

item.title: Hey YouTube creators, it’s time to start labeling AI-generated content in your videos - CNN
item.description:
1. Hey YouTube creators, it’s time to start labeling AI-generated content in your videos  CNN

  4. Kids' Cartoons Get a Free Pass From YouTube's Deepfake Disclosure Rules  WIRED
  5. YouTube now requires labels for some — but not all — AI-generated videos  Mashable
